channel.title: Secondment on Charalampos Kalalas
channel.description: Recent content in Secondment on Charalampos Kalalas

item.title: Visiting Researcher at Aalborg University, Denmark
item.description: I visited the MassM2M research group at Aalborg University from May to July 2017. I worked on code-expanded random access schemes for massive machine-type communications under the supervision of Dr. Cedomir Stefanovic and Dr. Petar Popovski.
